props.description:
Whether the menu should render in expanded mode.
If `undefined`, it follows `MenuExpandContext` value.
If provided, it overrides the context.
props.title: expanded

props.description: Whether to show popover for buttons when the menu is collapsed. Defaults to true.
props.title: showPopoversWhenCollapsed

props.description: Position of the popovers for buttons when the menu is collapsed. Defaults to "right".
props.title: popoverPosition

props.description: Sets the state of the button as active/inactive.
props.title: active

props.description:
Controlled override for menu expansion state. This prop does not manage internal state
and is not forwarded to the DOM as an attribute. It is used only for layout and visual
state determination.
If not provided, the expanded state will be determined by the context.
props.title: expanded

props.description: Function executed when clicking the button.
props.title: onClick

props.description: Sets an icon element on the left of the button.
props.title: startIcon

props.description: Whether to show popovers when the button is collapsed. Defaults to true.
props.title: showPopoversWhenCollapsed
